delete.action: To proceed with deletion, click below.
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
delete.title: Confirm Delete
delete.warning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

mpcard.empty: Please paste official account card content.
mpcard.hint: Copy the official account card code block from WeChat backend and paste it here.
mpcard.placeholder:
Example:
```mpcard
id: gh_xxx
headimg: https://...
nickname: Official Account
signature: Account description
```
mpcard.title: Insert official account card

publish.message: Are you sure you want to publish this article?
publish.title: Confirm publish
publish.warning: Publishing outside of WeChat MP may not be as efficient and some features might not work as expected (e.g., tags, pushing to public accounts).
